.. inclusion-marker-do-not-remove

D-Wave Micro Client dimod
=========================

dimod wrapper for the `D-Wave Micro Client <https://github.com/dwavesystems/dwave_micro_client>`_

Installation
------------

To install:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install dwave_micro_client_dimod

To build from souce:

.. code-block:: bash
    
    pip install .
